title: Quarto Presentation Template
text:
What This Template Includes

Custom logo and theming
Code blocks with syntax highlighting
Two-column layouts
Diagrams with Mermaid
Mathematical equations
Tables and callouts
Speaker notes


Press ‘S’ to open speaker view with notes and timer.

title: Quarto Presentation Template
text:
Code Examples
Python

import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("data.csv")
summary = df.groupby("category").agg({"value": ["mean", "std"]})
print(summary)

Bash
# Process data with command-line tools
cat data.csv | \
  awk -F',' 'NR>1 {sum[$1]+=$2; count[$1]++}
  END {for (k in sum) print k, sum[k]/count[k]}'

title: Quarto Presentation Template
text:
Mermaid Diagrams





flowchart LR
    A[Data Collection] --> B[Processing]
    B --> C[Analysis]
    C --> D[Visualization]
    D --> E[Report]

title: Quarto Presentation Template
text:
Architecture Diagram





flowchart TB
    subgraph Frontend
        A[Web App]
        B[Mobile App]
    end
    subgraph Backend
        C[API Server]
        D[Database]
    end
    A --> C
    B --> C
    C --> D

title: Quarto Presentation Template
text:
Mathematical Equations
Inline math: The quadratic formula is \(x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}\)
Display math:
\[
\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi}
\]
\[
\nabla \times \mathbf{E} = -\frac{\partial \mathbf{B}}{\partial t}
\]

title: Quarto Presentation Template
text:
Callouts






Note


Use callouts to highlight important information.









Pro Tip


Press F for fullscreen mode during your presentation.









Warning


Callouts can also indicate warnings or cautions.

title: Quarto Presentation Template
text:
Incremental Lists

First point appears
Then the second
Finally the third


Use . . . to create pauses between any content.

title: Quarto Presentation Template
text:
Thank You
Get Started

Click “Use this template” on GitHub
Clone your new repository
Edit this file: content/index.qmd
Run make devel to preview
Run make deploy to publish

Resources
